rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0001
rows.name:
You lot fight in specialized roles,
surely? Like, one's a defender, one's
attacker, and one heals?

rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The best attacker needs to be out front
attacking the enemy until one of them
goes down.

rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0003
rows.name:
That's not to say attackers should be
reckless.

rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The more you attack an enemy, the
more aggro you're going to draw.
That's a problem for an attacker.

rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0005
rows.name:
You need to moderate the attack and
have the defense absorb some of the
aggro. That's the iron law of combat!

rows.label: tlk70000076_01_msg0006
rows.name:
...Well, of course there's no need to
tell you that. You managed to best me
in combat, after all.
